About the Company: Fenoplast Ltd is a name that has been at the core of the finest automotive upholstery.The product range of the company includes PVC Leather Cloth which is used for Domestic upholstery,Automobile upholstery for cars, two wheelers and tractor seats,Footwear industry for ladies sandals, gents footwear, children shoes, sports shoes, ladies bags, leather lining and garments.PVC Film under which they produce differents types of PVC film like PVC soft clear film,PVC Soft Opaque film,PVC Blister pack film and PVC Rigid film (Opaque)..The company also in the business activities of PVC Film, PVC Leather Cloth Sheets.

registrars.name: Venture Capital & Corporate Investments Pvt. Ltd.
